name: Pokémon Orange Edition
description:
-+Playable Prototype+-

WARNING:
There is no goal to this game, you can only walk around and explore. This game may not be continued! This is just a small demo game with a small map to explore I made for fun, destination or fate of the project is yet unknown, though it will most likely be discontinued before Nintendos lawyers pull up my drive way in a black SUV. Enjoy!

Fully compatible with Keyboard and XBOX Controller

WASD/ Left Joystick - Move
Mouse/ Right Joystick - rotate camera
RMB/ LT - Zoom/ switch walking speed
Space/ A - Jump
Shift/ Press down L. Joystick - Sprint
